title: Analysis of 2019 Kaggle ML & DS Survey
description: This is an analysis based on Kaggle survey data, details are at https://www.kaggle.com/c/kaggle-survey-2019.

title: Genetic Algorithm for Feature Selection
description: An example of how to use genetic algorithms for feature selection using the programming language "R"

title: Uwe's book list
description: In this list I keep track of books which impressed me in the fields of Society development, Artificial Intelligence, Purposeful Networking, Psychology, Society,  Politics, Tech, R, Machine Learning, ...

title: Simulated Annealing optimisation of Reinforcement Learning hyper parameters
description: How to employ simulated annealing to optimize reinforcement learning hyper parameters with the programming language "R"

title: Create a blog with Distill
description: Tutorial to build a blog with Distill. A RStudio package which allows to write scientific and technical articles in a suitable format for the web. 'Distill' articles feature attractive, reader-friendly typography, flexible layout options for visualizations, and full support for footnotes and citations.
